texts.connectionErrorMist:
Unable to connect. Please start geth using:

__node__

Make sure you set your IPC path to the default one, when using a different datadir, e.g.
geth --datadir ... --ipcpath /Users/<yourUser>/Library/Ethereum/geth.ipc
or
geth --datadir ... --ipcpath /Users/<yourUser>/.ethereum/geth.ipc.

Optional add: --unlock <yourAccount>.
texts.connectionErrorBrowser:
Unable to connect. Please start geth with the following options:

__node__

Optional add: --unlock <yourAccount>.

noAccounts.title: You have no accounts yet
noAccounts.text: Before using the Wallet you need to create at least one account with a strong password.

error.wrongChain: You seem on a different chain, please restart the wallet!

testnetWallet.walletNeedsDeployment:
You seem to be on a testnet.

There is no original wallet found, we need to deploy a wallet, which can be used by the wallet stub contracts, from your address:

__account__

Please make sure this address has at least 1 ether!
testnetWallet.testnetWalletDeployed:
Original wallet deployed!
An original wallet was deployed on the address:

__address__.

accounts.title: Wallet Overview
accounts.accountNote: Accounts can't list incoming transactions, please create a wallet to store ether.
accounts.qrCodeLabel: Point a compatible mobile app to this code
accounts.walletsDescription: Wallets are contracts that hold and secure ether. They can have multiple accounts as owners and keep a full log of all transactions.
accounts.accountsDescription: Accounts are password protected keys that control contracts.

modal.deleteText:
Do you really want to delete the wallet?
If you lose the wallet address, you will lose the funds on it!

Type the name of the wallet to confirm the deletion.
modal.backupWallet:
Backup your wallet!

Make sure to write down the address so you can import it again, if needed.
__address__

error.noDataDeployed: No data is deployed on the contract address!

simple.title: Simple Wallet
simple.description: A simple wallet without additional security measures.
simple.warning: Note: If your owner account is compromised your wallet has no protection.

multisig.title: Multisignature Wallet
multisig.description: A wallet controlled by multiple accounts
multisig.text1: This is a joint wallet controlled by
multisig.text2: owners. You can send up to
multisig.text4: Any transaction over that daily limit requires the confirmation of

import.title: Import wallet
import.youreOwner: Your "__account__" account is an owner of the wallet.
import.watchOnly: You don't own the wallet, but you can add it as a "WATCH ONLY" wallet.
import.notWallet: This address has no wallet contract.

error.stubHasNoOrigWalletAddress: Your stub contract has no original wallet address set, please restart your wallet!

error.emptyWallet: The wallet you want to send from is empty.
error.notEnoughFunds: You don't have enough funds in the wallet.
error.noAmount: You didn't specify an amount to send.

texts.sendAmountEquivalent: You want to send the equivalent of __amount__ __unit__ in ether, using Kraken.com current exchange rate.
texts.sendToken: You are requesting to send __amount__ __symbol__ of __name__ a currency built in an ethereum contract. The current sender account has a balance of __balance__ __symbol__
texts.overDailyLimit: This amount is over the remaining daily limit of __limit__ (of __total__ per day), so you need __count__ other account to confirm.
texts.overDailyLimit_plural: This amount is over the remaining daily limit of __limit__ (of __total__ per day), so you need __count__ other accounts to confirm.
texts.underDailyLimit: This amount is under the remaining daily limit of __limit__ (of __total__ per day), means it will send immediately.
texts.sendFee: This is the most amount of money that might be used to process this transaction. Your transaction will be mined __timetext__.
texts.addData: You can add extra data to send along with your transaction. If you leave the "to" field empty it will try to generate a contract from your data.
texts.dataNotExecutable: The data seems not to be executabe, that means this transaction will use up all the gas you provide.
texts.cantEstimateGas: We can't estimate your gas usage properly, as you need at least 1 ether in your account.

timeTexts.0: in a few minutes or more

tokens.title: Custom Tokens
tokens.subTitle: Added tokens
tokens.description: Tokens are currencies built on the Ethereum platform. Learn how to build your own.
tokens.deleteToken: Do you want to remove the token __token__ from your list?
